name: aedg_office_swh
modeler_description_xml: Measure is applied to restroom space types.  All existing swh systems are deleted.  The total SWH load is divided evenly among the restroom spaces in the model.  Loads are applied on a per employee basis.  The user can input number of employees manually.  Otherwise, the measure will calculate the number of employees from the office space floor area.  If there is no office space floor area, the user wil be required to specify a number of employees.
description_xml: Measure replaces existing swh equipment (if any) with the swh equipment recommendations of the 50% Small and Medium Office AEDG.
